function NPC_111034:Init(NPCID) --[[ 5: 등딱지 파괴를 위한 수치 누적 --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 5);
NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_1 = 211103414 -- 성스러운폭발 NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_2 = 211103413 -- 독구름 폭풍 NPC_111034.PhaseChangeNO = 0
NPC_111034.DataIdxCarapace = 5 NPC_111034.LimitForBreakCarapace1 = NPC_111034.MaxHP/10 NPC_111034.LimitForBreakCarapace2 = NPC_111034.MaxHP/10 end
function NPC_111034:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 5 do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end -- for
this:UseTalentSelf( 211103406 ) end
function NPC_111034:SmartIdle( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:IsRear( Enemy ) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103417 ) end end
function NPC_111034:PhaseChange( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 페이즈 1+2 될 때 바둥거리는거 한번만 하기 --GLog( "NPC_512000:PhaseChangeNO\n" )
if NPC_111034.PhaseChangeNO == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103410 ) NPC_111034.PhaseChangeNO = 1 end
end
function NPC_111034:Phase1_dummyspawn( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 더미 소환(도너츠 형) --GLog( "NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness\n" ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) local Minion = AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( 111036, WorldPos ) AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetTarget( Minion ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( 211103450 ) end
function NPC_111034:OnStartFallingStone( ThisActor, Enemy ) GLog( "NPC_111034:OnStartFallingStone\n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( 111036, WorldPos ) --Minion:UseTalentSelf( 211103450 ) end
function NPC_111034:phase3_debuff( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- 랜덤으로 캐릭터에게 디버프사용 --GLog( "NPC_111034:phase3_debuff\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88024 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88025 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88020 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88022 )
local NewEnemy = ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_1 ) then return end if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_2 ) then return end
--ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0111034_154") ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_1, NewEnemy ) NewEnemy:RemoveBuff( 88030 ) NewEnemy:RemoveBuff( 88033 ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_2, Enemy ) end
function NPC_111034:OnYell(RequestNPC, TargetActor) this:Assist(RequestNPC) end
function NPC_111034:OnFinishAndAggroSwap( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) -- 머리부분 --return NPC_110011:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) return NPC_111034:AccDamageHead(HitInfo) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) -- 뿔 --return NPC_110011:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) return NPC_111034:AccDamageHead(HitInfo) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_2(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_3(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_4(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_5(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_6(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_7(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_8(HitInfo) NPC_111034:AccDamageStomach( this,HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_4_0(HitInfo) -- 머리부분 --return NPC_110011:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) return NPC_111034:AccDamageHead(HitInfo) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_4_1(HitInfo) -- 뿔 --return NPC_110011:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) return NPC_111034:AccDamageHead(HitInfo) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_4_2(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end

function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_4_6(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) end

function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_4_8(HitInfo) NPC_111034:AccDamageStomach( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:AccDamageBody( this, HitInfo ) -- 몸통 부분에 타격데미지 외에는 25% 데미지만 들어간다 if( HitInfo.Type == DA_SLASH or HitInfo.Type == DA_PIERCE ) then HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage*0.8 end
return HitInfo end
--[[ 날개가 하나 파괴될때마다 엉덩이부위의 25%의 데미지 증폭효과가 있다. --]]
function NPC_111034:AccDamageStomach( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) --GLog( "NPC_111034:AccDamageStomach\n" ) local PainPoint = 0
if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) then -- 파츠가 남아있다면 파괴로직을 수행한다. PainPoint = GetPainPoint( HitInfo ) else -- 등딱지가 다 파괴되었다면 힛 데미지를 50% 증폭 시키고 종료. HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage*1.5 return HitInfo end
local AccPoint = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_111034.DataIdxCarapace ) + HitInfo.Damage
-- 등딱지가 하나 파괴된 상태 if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) then HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage*1.25
if AccPoint > NPC_111034.LimitForBreakCarapace2 and PainPoint > 0 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103407 )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_111034.DataIdxCarapace, 0 ) else ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_111034.DataIdxCarapace, AccPoint ) end else -- 등딱지가 하나도 파괴되지 않은 상태 if AccPoint > NPC_111034.LimitForBreakCarapace1 and PainPoint > 0 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103407 )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_111034.DataIdxCarapace, 0 ) else ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_111034.DataIdxCarapace, AccPoint ) end end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_111034:AccDamageHead(dHitInfo) -- 타격만 데미지 적용된다
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( dHitInfo.Victim ) local LimitValue = ThisNPC:GetMaxHP()/10 -- 뿔이 부서지는 조건
if( dHitInfo.Type == DA_SLASH or dHitInfo.Type == DA_PIERCE ) then dHitInfo.Damage = dHitInfo.Damage*0.8 end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + dHitInfo.Damage ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) + dHitInfo.Damage )
if(ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) > 1300) then -- 머리를 때려 일정 데미지가 쌓이면 페인모션이 나온다 ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103408 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) end
if(ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) > LimitValue) then -- 머리를 때려 일정 데미지가 쌓이면 뿔이 부서진다 ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103410 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, dHitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end
return dHitInfo end
